data.author: joravasal
data.description:
Spocks (short for SPinning clOCKS, not related with the character from StarTrek, although I like to think he'd enjoy the watchface!) fills your Pebble screen with small analog watches that will animate to create a shape to display a digital clock and other data.

Fully configurable, you can make the face your own by changing, between others:
  · Colors for every section
  · Vibration settings (on Bluetooth status change and hourly)
  · 24h/12h
  · Leading 0 on the hours hidden or shown
  · Shake the watch to show the date (dd/mm or mm/dd), seconds, battery and/or bluetooth status.

The seconds are shown on the right, and each level represents a value between 5 seconds, the first one from 0 to 4 (like the third image shows), the second from 5 to 9... until 55 to 59 (the second image, animated shows this level before the animation).

On the left, the first two places represent the bluetooth status. When they point towards each other (like the third image) it is connected. If they point in different directions, then Bluetooth connection is lost. Underneath the bluetooth, the battery level can be found, each level for each tenth of the battery level, starting at 100% on top and finishing at 10% or 0% depending on the shape. The third image shows a battery level of 50%.

I hope you enjoy this watchface based on a design found in a hotel in London (Ham Yard Hotel). Please let me know if there is anyway I can improve it.
data.title: Spocks
